text: Rachel Ashley Platten (born May 20, 1981) is an American singer, and songwriter. She is best known for her 2015 single "Fight Song". The song was successful worldwide, including in the USA, Australia and Canada. Rachel Platten was born on, New York. She grew up in Newton, Massachusetts. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:American pop singers Category:Musicians from Manhattan Category:Singers from Massachusetts Category:Singer-songwriters from New York City Category:People from Newton, Massachusetts
title: Rachel Platten
